meanings.sent1: The cake was divided into seventieths for all the guests to have a fair share.
meanings.sent2: She received a seventieths portion of the inheritance from her late uncle.
meanings.sent3: The teacher jokingly claimed that the students' attention span was as short as a seventieths of a second.
meanings.sent4: In the vast ocean, each fish seemed as tiny as a seventieths of the whole.
meanings.sent5: The tiny ant carried a crumb that was only a seventieths of its body size.

meanings.definition: The ordinal number corresponding to seventy in a series.
meanings.sent1: Her birthday fell on the seventieths day of the year.
meanings.sent2: He was the seventieths person to cross the finish line in the race.
meanings.sent3: The seventieths student to arrive at the party won a special prize.
meanings.sent4: The seventieths page of the book contained a surprising plot twist.
meanings.sent5: The seventieths floor of the building offered a breathtaking view of the city skyline.
